title: Police officer shares firsthand experience with ‘cool’ Apple Watch fall detection feature
content:
A police officer on Reddit shares their experience answering an emergency call from an Apple Watch via fall detection. The call was to an elderly woman’s home and the officer says the feature was “cool to see it in action.”

more…

The post Police officer shares firsthand experience with ‘cool’ Apple Watch fall detection feature appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A police officer on Reddit shares their "cool" experience answering an emergency call from an Apple Watch via fall detection.
